description:
The updated, gram-conscious Raven Pro is lighter and fine-tuned for covering distance in technical terrain. The one-piece stainless steel head confidently chops, slices, and bites into ice while the clean and smooth lines of the shaft make plunging a snap. The new, curved shaft includes a grooved grip for better control while climbing or during self-arrest.

  • Stainless steel one-piece cast head with an updated, aggressive pick
  • Aluminum shaft with slight curve for use in technical terrain
  • Grooved shaft for increased grip
  • Leash no included
name: Black Diamond Raven Pro Ice Axe
